lyrics.stanza: "Keep the incense burning" On the altar fire; Let thy heart's petition, Let thy deep desire, Be a cloud of incense Wreathing God's own throne, Till His will among us Shall be fully done.
"Keep the incense burning" On the altar fire; Feed the flame, Lord Jesus, Till Thy whole desire Shall in us, Thy children, Find free course, and be Breathed through lips anointed For this ministry.
"Keep the incense burning," Hourly let it rise, Till from opened heavens, Till from flame-swept skies, Fire shall fall and kindle All hearts to a flame; Making us a glory To our Savior's name.
